# Spellbook Protection, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a pinch of metal shavings)

**Range:** Touch

**Effect:** One spellbook

**Duration:** 1 day/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (object)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (object)

**Source:** The Mage's Tower

As *[[Spellbook Protection (Spell)|spellbook protection]],* except anyone besides you who tries to pick up or open your spellbook will take a shock of 1d4 points of electricity damage per level.

This spell may be made permanent using the *[[Permanency (Spell)|permanency]]* spell.
